sorting.newest-to-oldest: 新しいものから古いものへ
sorting.topic-default: デフォルトのスレッドの並び順
restrictions.seconds-between-new: 新規ユーザーの投稿間の秒数
restrictions.rep-threshold: この制限が解除される前の評判しきい値
restrictions.seconds-defore-new: Seconds before new user can post
restrictions.seconds-edit-after: 投稿後にユーザーが投稿を編集できる秒数。(0は無効)
restrictions.seconds-delete-after: 投稿後にユーザーが投稿を削除できる秒数。(0は無効)
restrictions.replies-no-delete: Number of replies after users are disallowed to delete their own topics. (0 disabled)
restrictions.max-title-length: タイトルの最大文字数
restrictions.days-until-stale: Days until Topic is considered stale
restrictions.stale-help: If a topic is considered "stale", then a warning will be shown to users who attempt to reply to that topic.
timestamp.cut-off-help:
Dates & times will be shown in a relative manner (e.g. "3 hours ago" / "5 days ago"), and localised into various languages. After a certain point, this text can be switched to display the localised date itself (e.g. 5 Nov 2016 15:30).
(Default: 30, or one month). Set to 0 to always display dates, leave blank to always display relative times.
teaser.last-post: Last – Show the latest post, including the original post, if no replies
teaser.last-reply: Last – Show the latest reply, or a "No replies" placeholder if no replies
unread.min-track-last: Minimum posts in topic before tracking last read
composer-help:
The following settings govern the functionality and/or appearance of the post composer shown
				to users when they create new topics, or reply to existing topics.
composer.enable-plugin-help: Allow plugins to add content to the help tab
ip-tracking.each-post: Track IP Address for each post
